name: Touhou Candy Caper
description:
When Fall season arrived, Sanae found herself feeling nostalgic for the Halloween festivities from the Outside World, so she decided to make a bunch of home-made sweets and candies. But what's this... candy-hungry spirits? And why are they dressed up?

Gameplay

Protect the candy and fight enemies! If three enemies reach the candy bowl, then it's game over. Shoot those thieving spirits, and use Sanae's power over wind to jump and dash around platforms. Protect the sweets long enough to finish!

Controls

Move: Arrow keys

Space: Jump/Double jump

Space (Hold): Slow your descent while in midair

Z: Shoot

Left Shift (While holding left or right arrow keys): Dash
